name: Tree Simulator 2020
description: It's exactly what it sounds like. You are the tree! You are equaled by no other. Relax and be the best tree you can be.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
